Class RaytracerFrame

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--AlgFrame
        |
        +--RaytracerFrame
public class RaytracerFrame
extends AlgFrame

RaytracerFrame.java a raytracer animation frame. since most of the scene does not change, adds a pointer to a single DisplayFrame that holds the unchanging data.

Since:
JDK1.1.7A
Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

Constructor Detail

RaytracerFrame

public RaytracerFrame(int c,
                      java.lang.String s,
                      DisplayFrame f2,
                      DisplayFrame sf,
                      T3d camera_pt,
                      double d)
create one frame of a recording.
Parameters:
c - line of code to display in code window.
s - string to display in textfield.
f2 - image to display in display2 canvas.
sf - static image to display in display2 canvas.
camera_pt - camera point.
d2 - view distance for display 2.
Method Detail

get_static_frame2

public DisplayFrame get_static_frame2()
return data that is static in the scene for the wireframe. each frame needing this data drawn points to the same structure.

get view position.
